Name: Sergeant Scratch
Description: Sergeant Scratch is a valiant member of the WebtrES club, known for his tactical prowess on the digital battlefield. Once a frontline warrior in the Great Pixel Wars, his screen was shattered during a fateful encounter with the infamous Virus Vanguard. Despite his broken screen, which he wears as a badge of honor, Scratch continues to lead his team of button soldiers through the most challenging of cyber skirmishes. His unwavering spirit and feline agility make him a respected figure in the WebtrES ranks, inspiring others to push beyond their limits, even when the code gets tough.
